title: The Gods (3 new champion ideas) Hope one of them makes it into Lol!
body:
So i finally found the site where to post your League of legends ideas.

With some thinking and drawing and using diffrent programs i was ablle to create 3 gods:
Leon The moon's power
Shock The Storm's fury
Czin The lover of death

I put most of my thoughts into Leon (thats why there are 2 pics).
He uses the powers of moon for a powerful ultimate from the two things on his back as a laser... His basic attacks are a really small laser from his back.

Shock uses the power of the storm and electricity, her auto attack is electricity coming from her hand and she is a flying unit.

Czin is somehow related to death i really dont know...

I really dont have ideas what they can do im not talented at that im just talented at drawing...
Tell me what you think and you ideas for abilities lets create a champion togheter for Riot!
Im also full of ideas and drawings so please tell me if you wanna se more champions and pictures!
